metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010190 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
mgetty prior to 1.2.1 is affected by: out-of-bounds read. The impact is: DoS, the program may crash if the memory is not mapped. The component is: putwhitespan() in g3/pbm2g3.c. The attack vector is: Local, the victim must open a specially crafted file. The fixed version is: 1.2.1.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-1010190` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mgetty - 1.2.1-1
mgetty-fax - 1.2.1-1
mgetty-pvftools - 1.2.1-1
mgetty-viewfax - 1.2.1-1
mgetty-voice - 1.2.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mgetty package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.1-1').
